data.text: “Medaa me ho adi kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔammisa mʼase;
Ɛda mu nyinaa, matrɛ me nsa mu ama
Nnipa a daa no wɔyi me ahi
Wɔtenana adamena so
wɔka sɛ, ‘Momfiri ha; mo mmɛn me,
“Hwɛ, wɔatwerɛ ato hɔ wɔ mʼanim sɛ,
mo ne mo agyanom bɔne nti,”
Yei ne deɛ Awurade seɛ:
Mede Yakob asefoɔ bɛba,
Saron bɛyɛ nnwankuo adidibea,
“Na mo a mogya Awurade
mede mo bɛto akofena ano,
Enti yei ne deɛ Otumfoɔ Awurade seɛ:
Mʼasomfoɔ bɛto nnwom
Mo din bɛyɛ mmusuo
Obiara a ɔsrɛ nhyira wɔ asase no so
“Hwɛ! Mɛbɔ
Nanso momma mo ani nnye na monni ahurisie afebɔɔ
Mɛsɛpɛ me ho wɔ Yerusalem mu,
“Ɛrensi bio wɔ mu.
Wɔbɛsisi afie na wɔatena mu,
Wɔrensisi afie mma afoforɔ mmɛtena mu bio,
Wɔremmrɛ nnwu
Mɛbua wɔn ansa na wɔafrɛ me.
Pataku ne odwammaa bɛdidi abɔ mu;
